rules_text: When this creature enters, create an implant token with your choice of a vigilance counter or a trample counter. [i](It’s a token artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery”)[/i]
notes:
https://www.deviantart.com/crazyasian1/art/Inferno-454542645

OG art_1:
Carlo Spagnola on Artstation
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/X1q5dR

OG_4:
When MV3 Ursadrone Firewarden enters, choose one —
• Put a vigilance or a trample counter on MV3 Ursadrone Firewarden.
• Put a vigilance and a trample counter on target artifact.


OG_3:
When MV3 Pepperhorn Mintotaur enters, put your choice of a vigilance or a trample counter on target artifact you control.



OG_2:
When MV3 Pepperhorn Mintotaur enters the battlefield, create an implant with your choice of a vigilance or a trample counter.


OG_1:
When MV3 Vigil enters the battlefield, create an Implant with a Vigilance counter.
